City Hall
=========

City Hall Offices
-----------------

Orange City Hall offices many departments within the city.  Citizens looking to speak with any of the following departments may visit Orange City Hall:

* City Manager
* City Secretary
* Finance
* Personnel
* Billing and Collections
* Economic Development
* Convention & Visitors Bureau

### [Contact Us](https://orangetexas.gov/Directory.aspx)

1. #### City Hall

   **Physical Address**
   View Map   
   812 N 16th Street  
   Orange, TX 77630

     


   812 N 16th Street Orange TX 77630

   [Directions](https://www.google.com/maps/place/812+N+16th+Street++Orange+TX+77630 "Open location on Google Maps")

     

   Phone: [409-883-1081](tel:4098831081)

     

   ### Hours

   Monday through Friday  
   8 am to 5 pm
